attributes.action: lobby cadbury to create a giant 'creme egg'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets face it, everyone you have ever met wishes that the 'creme egg' easter eggs were actually giant creme eggs (ie: actually filled with the cream substance). We believe the time has come for action, so do your bit. Help us realise this dream.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
